Docs.summary: Constants and parameter names for controlling text-to-speech.

Docs.param: A containing a Java Native Interface (JNI) object reference.
Docs.summary: A constructor used when creating managed representations of JNI objects; called by the runtime.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Activity Action: Starts the activity from the platform TextToSpeech engine to verify the proper installation and availability of the resource files on the system.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Activity intent for getting some sample text to use for demonstrating TTS.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Activity Action: Triggers the platform TextToSpeech engine to start the activity that installs the resource files on the device that are required for TTS to be operational.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: broadcast to signal the change in the list of available languages or/and their features.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Default audio stream used when playing synthesized speech.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra information received with the F:Android.Speech.Tts.TextToSpeech+Engine.ActionCheckTtsData intent result where the TextToSpeech engine returns an ArrayList of all the available voices. The format of each voice is: lang-COUNTRY-variant where COUNTRY and variant are optional (ie, "eng" or "eng-USA" or "eng-USA-FEMALE").

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra information sent with the F:Android.Speech.Tts.TextToSpeech+Engine.ActionCheckTtsData intent where the caller indicates to the TextToSpeech engine which specific sets of voice data to check for by sending an ArrayList of the voices that are of interest. The format of each voice is: lang-COUNTRY-variant where COUNTRY and variant are optional (ie, "eng" or "eng-USA" or "eng-USA-FEMALE").

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra information received with the intent result where the TextToSpeech engine returns an String with sample text for requested voice

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra information received with the intent result.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra information received with the F:Android.Speech.Tts.TextToSpeech+Engine.ActionCheckTtsData intent result where the TextToSpeech engine returns an ArrayList of all the unavailable voices. The format of each voice is: lang-COUNTRY-variant where COUNTRY and variant are optional (ie, "eng" or "eng-USA" or "eng-USA-FEMALE").

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra information received with the F:Android.Speech.Tts.TextToSpeech+Engine.ActionCheckTtsData intent result where the TextToSpeech engine specifies the file names of its resources under the resource path.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra information received with the F:Android.Speech.Tts.TextToSpeech+Engine.ActionCheckTtsData intent result where the TextToSpeech engine specifies the locale associated with each resource file.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra information received with the F:Android.Speech.Tts.TextToSpeech+Engine.ActionCheckTtsData intent result where the TextToSpeech engine specifies the path to its resources.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Parameter key to identify an utterance in the T:Android.Speech.Tts.TextToSpeech+IOnUtteranceCompletedListener after text has been spoken, a file has been played back or a silence duration has elapsed.

Docs.summary: Name under which a text to speech engine publishes information about itself.
